title._content: Image taken from page 97 of '[Hand Book to the Geology of Weymouth and the Island of Portland. With notes on the natural history of the coast and neighbourhood ... Accompanied by a map of the district ... and numerous other illustrations.]'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "[Hand Book to the Geology of Weymouth and the Island of Portland. With notes on the natural history of the coast and neighbourhood ... Accompanied by a map of the district ... and numerous other illustrations.]" Author: DAMON, Robert. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 7108.aaa.6." Page: 97 Place of Publishing: Weymouth Date of Publishing: 1884 Publisher: R. F. Damon Edition: [Another edition.] Geology of Weymouth, Portland, and Coast of Dorsetshire, from Swanage to Bridport-on-the Sea: with natural history and archaeological notes ... New and enlarged edition. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000857621 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals. If you wish to purchase a high quality copy of the page that this image is drawn from, please order it here.
